snippet: Dr. Roberto Margo, the only veterinarian in Rio Grande City, feels he cannot retire because of a shortage of rural doctors to treat the large animals that make up most of his practice.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Roberto Margo, the only veterinarian in Rio Grande City, feels he cannot retire because of a shortage of rural doctors to treat the large animals that make up most of his practice.

headline.seo: A Shortage of Rural Veterinarians Means Retirement Must Wait
headline.main: No One Else for Animals, So Retirement Must Wait
headline.print_headline: No One Else For Animals, So Retirement Must Wait
